Position

Member, Term Expires March 2027

## Contact Information

Phone Number

(603) 642-3342

Fax Number

(603) 642-4108

Office Hours

Mon, Tues, Wed, &amp; Thurs: 9:00 am to 4:00 pm  
Fri: 9:00 am to 12:00 pm  
***Office Closed Friday Afternoons.***

Address

163 Main Street  
PO Box 716  
Kingston, NH 03848
